languages.text: "Опасные, злобные, беспощадные ксенотвари, изловленные в момент, когда они готовились творить зло супротив Империума! Но сейчас они безопасны. Наши клетки выдержат их напор. Хотя я не рекомендовал бы подходить слишком уж близко, ха-ха!"

traits.locale_text: "Опасные, злобные, беспощадные ксенотвари, изловленные в момент, когда они готовились творить зло супротив Империума! Но сейчас они безопасны. Наши клетки выдержат их напор. Хотя я не рекомендовал бы подходить слишком уж близко, ха-ха!"

languages.text: "Dangerous, vicious, ruthless xenobeasts, caught red-handed as they were attempting to commit evil against the Imperium! But right now, they're harmless. Our cages can withstand their rage. But I wouldn't recommend getting too close, ha ha!"
languages.original_text: "Опасные, злобные, беспощадные ксенотвари, изловленные в момент, когда они готовились творить зло супротив Империума! Но сейчас они безопасны. Наши клетки выдержат их напор. Хотя я не рекомендовал бы подходить слишком уж близко, ха-ха!"

traits.locale_text: "Dangerous, vicious, ruthless xeno-monsters, caught red-handed as they were attempting to commit evil against the Imperium! But at this moment, they're harmless. Our cages can withstand their rage. But I wouldn't recommend getting too close, ha ha!"

"Dangerous, vicious, ruthless xeno-monsters, caught red-handed as they were attempting to commit evil against the Imperium! But at this moment, they're harmless. Our cages can withstand their rage. But I wouldn't recommend getting too close, ha ha!"

"Dangerous, vicious, ruthless xeno-beasts, caught red-handed as they were attempting to commit evil against the Imperium! But right now, they're harmless. Our cages can withstand their rage. But I wouldn't recommend getting too close, ha ha!"

"Dangerous, vicious, ruthless xeno-beasts, caught red-handed as they were attempting to commit evil against the Imperium! But right now, they're harmless. Our cages can withstand their rage. But I wouldn't recommend getting too close, ha ha!"

"Dangerous, vicious, ruthless xenobeasts, caught red-handed as they were attempting to commit evil against the Imperium! But right now, they're harmless. Our cages can withstand their rage. But I wouldn't recommend getting too close, ha ha!"

languages.text: 「帝国に対して悪事を働こうとしたところを現行犯で捕らえた、危険で狂暴で冷酷な異世界の化け物たちですよ！ま、今は無害ですけどね。うちの檻は奴らが暴れてもびくともしません。でも、あまり近くに寄らないほうがいいですよ、ハハ！」
languages.original_text: "Dangerous, vicious, ruthless xenobeasts, caught red-handed as they were attempting to commit evil against the Imperium! But right now, they're harmless. Our cages can withstand their rage. But I wouldn't recommend getting too close, ha ha!"

traits.locale_text: 「帝国に対して悪事を働こうとしたところを現行犯で捕らえた、危険で狂暴で冷酷な異世界の化け物たちですよ！ま、今は無害ですけどね。うちの檻は奴らが暴れてもびくともしません。でも、あまり近くに寄らないほうがいいですよ、ハハ！」

languages.text: “这些都是危险、恶毒、无情的异兽，它们在对帝国实施恶行时被当场抓获！不过现在，它们不会伤害任何人了，我们的笼子足以承受它们的愤怒。不过，我不建议靠得太近，哈哈！”
languages.original_text: "Dangerous, vicious, ruthless xenobeasts, caught red-handed as they were attempting to commit evil against the Imperium! But right now, they're harmless. Our cages can withstand their rage. But I wouldn't recommend getting too close, ha ha!"

traits.locale_text: “这些都是危险、恶毒、无情的异兽，它们在对帝国实施恶行时被当场抓获！不过现在，它们不会伤害任何人了，我们的笼子足以承受它们的愤怒。不过，我不建议靠得太近，哈哈！”

languages.text: «¡Xenobestias peligrosas, malvadas y sanguinarias, capturadas in fraganti cuando sembraban el mal contra el Imperium! Pero ahora mismo, son inofensivas. Nuestras jaulas neutralizan su furia. Pero no le recomendaría que se acercara demasiado. ¡Ja, ja!».
languages.original_text: "Dangerous, vicious, ruthless xenobeasts, caught red-handed as they were attempting to commit evil against the Imperium! But right now, they're harmless. Our cages can withstand their rage. But I wouldn't recommend getting too close, ha ha!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Xenobestias peligrosas, malvadas y sanguinarias, capturadas in fraganti cuando sembraban el mal contra el Imperium! Pero ahora mismo, son inofensivas. Nuestras jaulas neutralizan su furia. Pero no le recomendaría que se acercara demasiado. ¡Ja, ja!».

languages.text: « C'est une ménagerie composée de créatures redoutables et sans merci ! Ces xénos ont tous été capturés alors qu'ils tentaient de nuire à notre grand Imperium ! Mais ils ne représentent plus aucun danger, grâce à nos cages spécialement conçues pour résister à leur fureur. Enfin, je vous conseille tout de même de ne pas vous approcher trop près, haha ! »
languages.original_text: "Dangerous, vicious, ruthless xenobeasts, caught red-handed as they were attempting to commit evil against the Imperium! But right now, they're harmless. Our cages can withstand their rage. But I wouldn't recommend getting too close, ha ha!"

traits.locale_text: « C'est une ménagerie composée de créatures redoutables et sans merci ! Ces xénos ont tous été capturés alors qu'ils tentaient de nuire à notre grand Imperium ! Mais ils ne représentent plus aucun danger, grâce à nos cages spécialement conçues pour résister à leur fureur. Enfin, je vous conseille tout de même de ne pas vous approcher trop près, haha ! »

languages.text: "Gefährliche, bösartige, gnadenlose Xenobestien, auf frischer Tat ergriffen, als sie versuchten, Untaten gegen das Imperium zu verüben! Aber jetzt sind sie harmlos. Unsere Käfige widerstehen ihrem Zorn. Aber ich würde empfehlen, Abstand zu halten, ha ha!"
languages.original_text: "Dangerous, vicious, ruthless xenobeasts, caught red-handed as they were attempting to commit evil against the Imperium! But right now, they're harmless. Our cages can withstand their rage. But I wouldn't recommend getting too close, ha ha!"

traits.locale_text: "Gefährliche, bösartige, gnadenlose Xenobestien, auf frischer Tat ergriffen, als sie versuchten, Untaten gegen das Imperium zu verüben! Aber jetzt sind sie harmlos. Unsere Käfige widerstehen ihrem Zorn. Aber ich würde empfehlen, Abstand zu halten, ha ha!"

languages.text: "Tehlikeli, vahşi, acımasız zenohayvanlar! İmparatorluk'a karşı fesat peşindeyken suç üstü yakalandılar! Ama artık zarar vermezler. Zira kafeslerimiz, öfkelerine direnebilecek şekilde tasarlanmıştır. Yine de çok yaklaşmayın derim, ha ha!"
languages.original_text: "Dangerous, vicious, ruthless xenobeasts, caught red-handed as they were attempting to commit evil against the Imperium! But right now, they're harmless. Our cages can withstand their rage. But I wouldn't recommend getting too close, ha ha!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu zenohayvanlar tehlikelidirler, vahşidirler, acımasızdırlar. İmparatorluk'a karşı kötülük yapma girişimleri sırasında suç üstü yakalandılar ve zararsız hâle getirildiler. Kafeslerimiz onların hiddetine direnebilecek şekilde tasarlanmıştır ama çok yakına girmenizi tavsiye etmem, ha ha!"
